# Square Root of 3

> [Square root][@stdlib/math/base/special/sqrt] of `3`.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var SQRT3 = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-three' );
```

#### SQRT3

[Square root][@stdlib/math/base/special/sqrt] of `3`.

``` javascript
SQRT3 === 1.7320508075688772;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var SQRT3 = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-three' );

console.log( SQRT3 );
// => 1.7320508075688772
```

</section>
